BackstoryDef.title: damaged clone
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is an artificially grown copy of someone. Unfortunately, due to problems in the cloning process, [PAWN_pronoun] is damaged mentally and physically.

BackstoryDef.title: colony replicant
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is an artificially grown copy of someone. Despite taking [PAWN_possessive] appearance from another, [PAWN_pronoun] is a unique individual. [PAWN_nameDef] doesn't have the skills of [PAWN_possessive] genetic parent, but [PAWN_pronoun] can learn at a quickened rate.

BackstoryDef.title: enhanced replicant
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is an artificially grown copy of someone for a single purpose. [PAWN_possessive] memory wiped and imprinted with combat training, [PAWN_pronoun] also has high tolerance of poor conditions.

BackstoryDef.title: oppressed slave
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Chained by fate and fashion, [PAWN_nameDef] served as a nameless, faceless laborer. Forbidden from fighting, learning, or even dreaming too loudly. Their daily highlight? Not being vaporized.

BackstoryDef.title: Slave driver
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Armed with a cruel Rod of Anguish and crueler orders, [PAWN_nameDef] was tasked with keeping miners and laborers in line. Their life was measured in screams per hour, not hours per shift. They learned how to instill fear, not how to lift a pick.

BackstoryDef.title: Overseer’s lackey
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Not all who serve hold a weapon. [PAWN_nameDef] carried whips, schedules, and buckets of water for the “real” enforcers. They became adept at surviving by standing just far enough behind authority.

BackstoryDef.title: Broken overseer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Once entrusted with enforcing a System Lord’s will, [PAWN_nameDef] eventually fell from grace—whether from pity, defiance, or sheer exhaustion. Branded and discarded, they drift between fear of punishment and memories of the screams they once commanded.
